subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Charlotte Bobcats reserve forward Adam Morrison will probably miss the season after a magnetic resonance imaging test revealed a torn ligament in his left knee. Morrison was injured Saturday in a preseason game against the Lakers while trying to defend Luke Walton on a drive to the basket.
